testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure restaurant name is displayed correctly after navigation
testCases.testSteps:
1. Select the restaurant
2. Click restaurant 
3. Navigate to Order Online
testCases.expectedResult: Selected Restaurant name should be displayed in header after redirection

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure status (Open/Closed) is shown accurately
testCases.testSteps: 1. Open restaurant order page
testCases.expectedResult: Status shown as “Open” or “Closed”

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure service selection (Dine-In/Delivery/Pickup) works properly
testCases.testSteps:
1. Click Choose Service 
2. Select service 
3. Verify service displays 
4. Click Restart
testCases.expectedResult: Selected service should display. Restart should reset to initial state

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure Book Now redirects to booking flow
testCases.testSteps: 1. Click Book Now
testCases.expectedResult: User is redirected to table booking page
testCases.actualResult: Table Booking page is POP=UP on current page

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure language selection changes page content
testCases.testSteps:
1. Click Language button 
2. Select different language
testCases.expectedResult: Page content updates to selected language
testCases.actualResult: Configured content of the page change the selected language

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure restaurant contact number is visible and clickable (for mobile call)
testCases.testSteps:
1. Verify contact number display 
2. Click on number (mobile device)
testCases.expectedResult: Number visible and clickable

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure searching available dish shows result
testCases.testSteps:
1. Enter available dish name in search bar
2. Click search
testCases.expectedResult: Dish should be displayed

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure searching unavailable dish shows “No Item Available” message
testCases.testSteps:
1. Enter non-existing dish name 
2. Click search
testCases.expectedResult: “No Item Available” message displayed

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure Main Dishes filter displays only main dishes
testCases.testSteps: 1. Click Main Dishes button
testCases.expectedResult: Main dishes displayed

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure Breakfast filter displays only breakfast dishes
testCases.testSteps: 1. Click Breakfast button
testCases.expectedResult: Breakfast dishes displayed

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure error prompt appears if user tries to add item before selecting service
testCases.testSteps: 1. Click Add on any dish
testCases.expectedResult: Prompt message: “Please select service first”
testCases.actualResult: Directly POP-UP Menu for select service

testCases.testScenario: Add Deals item without service selected
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure user cannot add Deals item if service is not selected
testCases.testSteps:
1. Go to Deals section 
2. Click Add on a deal
testCases.expectedResult: Prompt message: “Please select service first”
testCases.actualResult: Directly POP-UP Menu for select service

testCases.testScenario: Add Deals item with allowed service
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure user can add Deals item when service matches allowed service
testCases.testSteps:
1. Choose service as Dine-In 
2. Go to Deals section 
3. Add deal
testCases.expectedResult: Deal added to cart successfully

testCases.testScenario: Add Deals item with not-allowed service
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure user cannot add Deals item when service does not match specified allowed services
testCases.testSteps:
1. Choose service as Delivery 
2. Go to Deals section 
3. Add deal
testCases.expectedResult: Error message: “This deal is not available for Delivery. Please select Takeaway or Dine-In.”
testCases.actualResult: POP-UP alert box wiht message:This deal is available for: Take Away, Dine-In only.

testCases.testScenario: Verify multiple deals with mixed service options
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure correct behavior when multiple deals have different service restrictions
testCases.testSteps:
1. Choose one deal valid for Delivery 
2. Choose another deal restricted to Dine-In/Takeaway
testCases.expectedResult: Deal A added successfully under Delivery, Deal B shows restriction error
testCases.actualResult: System did't allow to add item

testCases.testScenario: Verify cart respects deal service restrictions
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure cart only contains deals/items valid under selected service
testCases.testSteps:
1. Add a deal valid under Delivery 
2. Switch service to Dine-In 
3. Verify cart items
testCases.expectedResult: Invalid deals should be removed/reset when service changes
testCases.actualResult: all items from the cart automatically removes

testCases.testScenario: Verify error handling when switching services
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure system properly handles when user switches service after adding deals with restrictions
testCases.testSteps:
1. Add deal valid for Takeaway 
2. Switch service to Delivery 
3. Verify cart
testCases.expectedResult: System should show warning: “Some items are not valid for this service. Please remove them.”
testCases.actualResult: when service is switch ,cart was reset

testCases.testScenario: Verify correct service applied in checkout
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure service type is correctly applied to checkout
testCases.testSteps:
1. Add items under selected service 
2. Go to checkout
testCases.expectedResult: Correct service type (Dine-In/Delivery/Pickup) displayed
testCases.actualResult: After deal is added into the cart and if service was change after that , cart autometically became empty

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure subtotal, taxes, and total amount are calculated correctly
testCases.testSteps: 1. Add multiple items 2. Verify total
testCases.expectedResult: Correct total = subtotal + taxes

testCases.testScenario: Verify removal of Special Deal items
testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure Special Deal items can be removed from cart like normal items (via remove button or counter = 0)
testCases.testSteps: 1. Add a special deal item to cart 2. Try removing it via remove (X) button 3. Try decreasing quantity to 0
testCases.expectedResult: Item should be removed from cart (just like normal items)
testCases.actualResult: Currently item cannot be removed, stays in cart

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure Book-Table page opens when user selects restaurant and clicks “Book Table”
testCases.testSteps: 1. From restaurant page, click Book Table 2. Check if Book-Table form is displayed
testCases.expectedResult: Book-Table form should open successfully

testCases.testCaseDescription: Check if form prevents submission when required fields are empty
testCases.testSteps: Leave all fields empty ? Click Submit
testCases.expectedResult: Form should not submit, error messages should be displayed for each mandatory field

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure valid date format is required and date cannot be left empty
testCases.testSteps: Enter invalid date / Leave blank ? Submit
testCases.expectedResult: Error should be shown, valid date must be entered
testCases.actualResult: button disable /Error message display for invalid form data

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure guest count cannot be 0 or negative
testCases.testSteps: Enter 0 guests ? Submit Enter -1 guests ? Submit
testCases.expectedResult: Should show error “Guests must be at least 1”

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure user must select a preferred time
testCases.testSteps: Do not select time ? Submit
testCases.expectedResult: Error should be displayed ? “Please select a preferred time”
testCases.actualResult: Error message is not display , but also submit button is disable so form can't submit

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure time slot is mandatory
testCases.testSteps: Do not select available slot ? Submit
testCases.expectedResult: Error message should be displayed ? “Please select a time slot”
testCases.actualResult: Error message is not display , but also submit button is disable so form can't submit

testCases.testCaseDescription: Check validation for mobile number format
testCases.testSteps: Enter invalid number (less than 10 digits / alphabets) Enter valid number
testCases.expectedResult:
Invalid ? Show error 
Valid ? Accepted

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure only valid email formats are accepted
testCases.testSteps: Enter invalid email ? Submit Enter valid email ? Submit
testCases.expectedResult:
Invalid ? Show error 
Valid ? Accepted

testCases.testCaseDescription: Validate character limit and mandatory status (if any)
testCases.testSteps: Enter very long string (more than allowed limit) Enter special characters
testCases.expectedResult: Should restrict length (e.g. 250 chars) Accept special characters only if allowed

testCases.testCaseDescription: Ensure booking request is submitted successfully with all valid inputs
testCases.testSteps: Fill valid data in all fields ? Click Submit
testCases.testData: Valid details (Date, Guests=2, Time=7PM, Email=valid, Mobile=valid)
testCases.expectedResult: Booking request should be submitted successfully, confirmation displayed
